item.title: [FELIX-4789] SCR Felix4188Test fails when run with framework 4.4.1 or newer
item.description:
By default the SCR tests are run with Felix 4.0.2. When using a newer framework implementation (e.g. 4.4.1 or 4.6.0) the following failure starts appearing.

BTW I didn't try it with any framework earlier than 4.4.1, so this failure might have been introduced before this version.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: The service that the test is looking for is in a different class space, therefore the test (which uses getServiceReferences()) does not see it.
